materials: Plastic Shopping Bags; Food Storage Bags; Video Game Consoles; PlayStation Consoles
notes: Kroger and Meijer Stores have made a commitment to local schools by partnering with Enviro-bag.  Participating schools collect certain plastic grocery sacks not only to help the environment, but also to raise funds.  Please keep in mind the schools need ONLY the bags specified below and please bring bags to the school.  This site only accepts Meijer plastic grocery bags.  Residents can call Enviro-Bag directly to find out what schools in their area are participating in the program at 800-866-3954.  Schools that are interested in participating in this fundraising/environmental program can do so by calling Enviro-bag at 1-800-866-3954 or by connecting online at www.envirobag.com.
